title: [3:22]外交部新聞發布會即將開始，陸慷是今天的發言人

replies.msg:
3:21:57 pm Foster Wong TOPLive Editor

Back in Beijing, Foreign Ministry press briefing is starting and Lu Kang is today's spokesman.

外交部新聞發布會即將開始，陸慷是今天的發言人。

replies.msg: 呀爺: in 侵侵 we 跪

Colin Keatinge TOPLive Editor colinkeatinge
A bit more on that from the Foreign Ministry briefing -- so to be clear, Foreign Ministry Spokesman Lu Kang said at the press conference in Beijing that China's tariff actions have taken effect after the U.S. ``unfair tariff'' actions.

We await more detail on what form those retaliatory actions take.

呢件太硬淨？
搵個第個 投降都無咁樣衰
